page.title: 05EMPLOYMENT
page.content:
OCCUPATION
Our area is sparsly populated. Only around the Crossways at Raloo and in Glenoe village are there many houses close together. We have tried to discover the occupations of the people who live in our area. We have farmers who live and work on their own land. We have teachers who live in our area and work in Larne, we have builders and policemen. We have coal men, milk men and a lorry driver working in our area. There is a minister and a business man, there are a lot of housewives, there is a professional golfer and a council worker. There is a vet and a nurse, a painetr and a carpenter and a joiner. There is also a waitress and a caretaker.
